last_message: SELECT message, date, country, city FROM entries WHERE tag = ? ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;
insert_new_entry: INSERT INTO entries (chapter_name, tag, date, country, city, message) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?);
last_message_before_date: SELECT message, date, country, city FROM entries WHERE tag = ? AND datetime(date) < datetime(?) ORDER BY datetime(date) DESC LIMIT 1;
next_message_after_date: SELECT message, date, country, city FROM entries WHERE tag = ? AND datetime(date) > datetime(?) ORDER BY datetime(date) ASC LIMIT 1;
